snippet: President Vladimir V. Putin is hoping to strengthen ties with the Pacific Rim and pursuing ambitious development in Russia itself.
abstract: President Vladimir V Putin of Russia is seizing on the annual Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation meeting as an opportunity to strengthen ties with the Pacific Rim and pursue ambitious development in Russia itself, starting with the decaying shipping city of Vladivostok, Russia, where the conference is being held.

byline.contributor: Andrew E. Kramer contributed reporting from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: President Vladimir V. Putin is hoping to strengthen ties with the Pacific Rim and pursuing ambitious development in Russia itself.

headline.seo: As APEC Meets in Russia, Putin Turns to Far East
headline.main: Putin’s Ambitions Turn to the Far East
headline.print_headline: Putin’s Ambitions Turn to the Far East

keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
keywords.name: glocations
